item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

12/24/2012's (Christmas Eve) location will be:

BAR

Known for being a big name in New Haven Style Pizza and brewing their own Beers, BAR is a part Restaurant, part Pub, part Night Club located on Crown Street.Â  They also sport a pool table for those interested, but there may be a wait for that.

This being Christmas Eve we have an available Organizer/Host Shortage. If you would like to fill in as Host for this event, please contact the Leadership team (Linked, click here). Otherwise we hope folks whom need this happy hour find each other easily by looking for one another and or posting on the event. We wish everyone a safe and happy holiday season, whichever holiday(s) you may decide to celebrate.

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... it's a come-whenever-you-want kind of thing.

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Unfortunately for this rare event (Christmas Eve) you're on your own. If you'd like to Host it for us, please contact the leadership team.
